readable.title: 1164765687_7aca07bbe7
readable.content: A man in a red shirt and glasses is bending down towards a small dog on a blanket with several stuffed animals . A man in a red shirt is giving toys to a small dog . A man is playing tug of war with his dog . A man playing with a black dog on a white blanket . A man playing with his dog on the blanket on the floor .
